alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Duval; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:04AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HEAT INDEX VALUES BETWEEN 105 AND 109 DEGREES ARE EXPECTED TODAY ACROSS THE BRUSH COUNTRY AND SOUTHERN COASTAL BEND... The combination of warm temperatures and high dewpoints will produce heat indices between 105 and 109 degrees today across the Brush Country and southern Coastal Bend, roughly areas near and west of Interstate 37 as well as inland portions of San Patricio County. A few locations across the southern Coastal Bend may approach values around 110 at times this afternoon. Residents with outdoor activities planned are urged to drink plenty of water, wear light weight and light colored clothing and take frequent breaks from the heat. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
